sources.title: South of Santa Fe (1942)
sources.description: To get the three needed business men to visit the Stevens mine, Roy stages a ride with the Vacaros and has them as honored guests. Seeing a chance to make a lot of money, gangster Harmon joins the ride and then has his men kidnap the three. Having filmed a fake holdup earlier, he uses the film to convince the Sheriff that Roy and the boys were the Kidnapers. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/south-of-santa-fe-1942/

sources.title: South of Santa Fe
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: South of Santa Fe (1942) ROY ROGERS
sources.description:
Stars: Roy Rogers, George 'Gabby' Hayes, Linda Hayes
Director: Joseph Kane

New Mexico is the scene of undeveloped gold mines and kidnapping. Modern elements include tommy guns, an airplane, two-way radios, fast cars, and big city gangsters.

sources.title: South of Santa Fe (1942) Roy Rogers - Western Movie
sources.description:
THEY GOT ROY... but they'll have to plug his gal to take him.New Mexico is the scene of undeveloped gold mines and kidnapping. Modern elements include tommy guns, an airplane, two-way radios, fast cars, and big city gangsters.

Director: Joseph Kane
Writer: James R. Webb 
Stars: Roy Rogers, George 'Gabby' Hayes, Linda Hayes 
Genres: Classics, Westen

metadata.Plot: To get the three needed business men to visit the Stevens mine, Roy stages a ride with the Vacaros and has them as honored guests. Seeing a chance to make a lot of money, gangster Harmon joins the ride and then has his men kidnap the three. Having filmed a fake holdup earlier, he uses the film to convince the Sheriff that Roy and the boys were the Kidnapers.
